nodes.text: Welcome to Ravenkeep, traveler. We've been having trouble with bandits lately.
They've been raiding our supply caravans, but something's odd. They're only taking specific items and leaving valuable goods behind.

responses.text: That is strange. I'd like to help investigate.

nodes.text: If you're willing to help, speak with Sarah at the tavern. She lost her brother to these bandits, and he was investigating something before he disappeared.
